data.name: Mahou Arms Original Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The echantingly beautiful and fresh soundtrack to Mahou Arms is now available with music composed by Dale North. Relive all the cool locations, driving battles, and emotional conversations over the course of 19 tracks.
data.about_the_game: The echantingly beautiful and fresh soundtrack to Mahou Arms is now available with music composed by Dale North. Relive all the cool locations, driving battles, and emotional conversations over the course of 19 tracks.
data.short_description: The echantingly beautiful and fresh soundtrack to Mahou Arms is now available with music composed by Dale North. Relive all the cool locations, driving battles, and emotional conversations over the course of 19 tracks.
